{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=12 (ER-12) |asin=B07KWJKW4S |price=250 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=router |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn= |pwr_poe=24V passive |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN7130 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=eMMC |fla2=8 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model=SPI NOR |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SFP |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, console port,, (RJ45),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8511;QCA8511-AL1C; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips= |flags=SFP |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.10.107-UBNT;EdgeOS; |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui_eth=B4:FB:E4 }} {{TagLine|Ubiquiti EdgeMAX EdgeRouter 12 (ER-12)}} :<small>''10-Port Gigabit Router with PoE Passthrough and 2 SFP Ports''</small> :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-12/ Product page] {{•}} [https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/categories/200321064-EdgeMAX Support page] {{•}} [https://dl.ubnt.com/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_DS.pdf Datasheet]
{{See also|Cavium|Ubiquiti Networks}}
===Model comparison=== :;[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/comparison/ EdgeMAX Model Comparison] *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 4 (ER-4)]] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64r5) :Ports: 3x GbE, 1x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 6P (ER-6P)]] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64r5) :Ports: 5x GbE, 1x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps :PoE Support: 5x 24V passive 2-pair/4-pair PoE *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 12 (ER-12)]] - e300 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64r5) :Ports: 10x GbE, 2x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps :Switch: LAN0 ÷ LAN7; 2x PoE 24V passive (LAN0 in/LAN9 out) *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter PRO]] (ERPro-8)/(ER-8) - e200 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN6120 @1GHz ''Octeon II'' (Dual Core MIPS64r2) :Ports: (6+2)x GbE, 2x SFP, 1x USB 2.0; Performance: 1.8Mpps :*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter]] 8 (ER-8) - e200 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter LITE]] (ERLite-3) - e110 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64r2) :Ports: 3x GbE, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 0.7Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter POE]] (ERPoe-5) - e110 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64r2) :Ports: 5x GbE, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 0.7Mpps :PoE Support: 5x 24V/48V/Passive 2-pair/4-pair PoE :*[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Security Gateway (USG)]] - e100 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X]] (ER-X)/(ER-X-SFP) - e50 :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz (Dual Core [[MIPS 1004Kc]]) :Ports: 5x GbE, 2x PoE (in/out), (1x SFP); Performance: 1.4Mpps :*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP]] (ER-X-SFP) - e50 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity (ER-8-XG)]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-infinity/ PPage] :CPU: [[Cavium]] [https://cavium.com/octeon-III-CN73XX-CN72XX-mips64-processors.html CN7360] @1.8GHz ''Octeon III'' (16x Core MIPS64r5) :8-Port 10G SFP+ Router (80Gbps), 4GB Flash, 16GB DDR4 RAM :Ports: 1x GbE, 8x SFP, 1x USB 3.0, Console; Performance: 18Mpps
